explanation: [0-0] A person wearing light blue jeans is sitting on a motorcycle, with flames and faint white smoke coming out of the rear wheel.

[0-10] A man wearing a black top and a blue helmet, holding the handlebars of the motorcycle with both hands, stands up from the motorcycle and slowly rotates around a woman wearing a black short-sleeved shirt and a black helmet. The woman in black rotates her right hand, while her left hand rests on the helmet, head down. The flaming rear tire draws a circle on the asphalt road around the woman in black, and white and black smoke billows from the back of the motorcycle. There are fences beside the asphalt road, with colorful advertising banners hanging on them. Behind the fences, there are many spectators, tents, and green trees. Some people are even standing on mounds outside the fence.
